R

r - Variable in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.Components.Rect

R - Static variable in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.KitBit
Shorter name for the constant RIGHT
readFromFile(String) - Method in class GlooKit.Utils.JSONObject
Adds key-value pairs to this JSONObject based on a .json file.
Rect - Class in GlooKit.GlooFramework.Components
 
Rect(GlooApplication, int) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.Components.Rect
 
Rect(Texture, int) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.Components.Rect
 
Rect(GlooApplication, float, float, float, float) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.Components.Rect
 
reescapeString(String) - Method in class GlooKit.Utils.JSONObject
Takes a String and preemptively escapes all special characters that will get interpreted when the String is constructed.
render() - Method in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooBatch.Batch
Makes a series of tasks (threads) equal in number to the number of open channels Each task is a lambda function to the render(int index) call immediately below
render(int, int) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooBatch.Batch
This render call is the one that actually does things! (Congrats on getting here) It is only called by virtue of a lambda function through a thread First, it gets the batch, vertices buffer, and indices buffer of its channel Then, it cycles through each drawing object in the batch and increments the pointSize of the buffers to account for each new object After that, it cycles though each drawing object and adds its vertices and indices to the vertices and indices buffers Finally, it flips the buffers so that they are ready to be sent to the GPU
render(Matrix) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooBatch
 
render(int) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooBatch
This non-abstract method eventually gets called after each batch-specific render method.
render(Matrix) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.DefaultBatch
 
render(Matrix) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.TextBatch
 
renderFrame(int, int) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooCore
This renderFrame call is essentially the main draw call for the entire program.
reset() - Method in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooCore.BatchQueue
 
RIGHT - Static variable in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.KitBit
Constant indicating that this KitBit should be right-justified within its container
ripBatch(int) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooCore.BatchQueue
 
ripBatch(int) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooCore
 
ripChild(int) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.GlooApplication
Overrides the ripChild(int) method of KitBit to use Nooks instead of general KitBits.
ripChild(int) - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.KitBit
Remove and return a child from the list of children of this KitBit, given the index of the child in the list of children.
room - Variable in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.GlooApplication
The "state" that the application is in.
Room - Class in GlooKit.GlooFramework
Rooms are owned by a GlooApplication and are the visual state of the application.
Room(GlooApplication, KitBit...) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.Room
Constructs a Room with only the GlooApplication and a list of KitBit which are the children of this Room.
RowSpan - Class in GlooKit.GlooFramework
A RowSpan is a Div which has a list of children that will be drawn horizontally across from left to right in the order added.
RowSpan(KitBit...) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.RowSpan
Overloads the default RowSpan constructor to only take a list of children.
RowSpan(int, String, KitBit...) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.RowSpan
Overloads the default RowSpan constructor to only take a vertical justification, a formatting String for setting the height, and a list of children.
RowSpan(int, int, String, String, KitBit...) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.RowSpan
Constructs a RowSpan with the normal parameters of the default KitBit constructor.
run() - Method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.GlooApplication
Starts the Application by running the game loop, which will call drawFrame(), calcFrame(double), and stepFrame(double) every frame until told to stop.
runConcurrent(String, Consumer<GlooApplication>) - Static method in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.GlooApplication
Spins off a new GlooApplication to run independently of a previously existing one in a new thread, given a name and a setup Consumer.
